plugin.name: AlgaruStudyHelper
plugin.author: Algaru
plugin.purpose: Supplement study output with more info

muclient.triggers: <trigger enabled="n" match="^(?.*) (?is in perfect health|has a few minor scratches|is showing a few grazes|is bleeding lightly|has some small wounds and bruises|is showing a few battle scars|has quite a few wounds|has some big nasty wounds and scratches|has some very nasty wounds|needs a hospital|is gravely injured|is at death's door)\.$" script="print_one_study_line" omit_from_output="y" name="study_health_trigger" sequence="100" regexp="y" group="study_health_triggers" />
muclient.script:
damage_table = { ["is in perfect health"] = {["color"] = "darkgreen", ["range"] = " 100% "}, ["has a few minor scratches"] = {["color"] = "green", ["range"] = "95-99%"}, ["is showing a few grazes"] = {["color"] = "limegreen", ["range"] = "85-94%"}, ["is bleeding lightly"] = {["color"] = "lime", ["range"] = "75-84%"}, ["has some small wounds and bruises"] = {["color"] = "lawngreen", ["range"] = "65-74%"}, ["is showing a few battle scars"] = {["color"] = "greenyellow", ["range"] = "55-64%"}, ["has quite a few wounds"] = {["color"] = "yellow", ["range"] = "45-54%"}, ["has some big nasty wounds and scratches"] = {["color"] = "orange", ["range"] = "35-44%"}, ["has some very nasty wounds"] = {["color"] = "darkorange", ["range"] = "25-34%"}, ["needs a hospital"] = {["color"] = "orangered", ["range"] = "15-24%"}, ["is gravely injured"] = {["color"] = "firebrick", ["range"] = " 5-14%"}, ["is at death's door"] = {["color"] = "darkred", ["range"] = " 0-4% "} }
damage_order = { "is in perfect health", "has a few minor scratches", "is showing a few grazes", "is bleeding lightly", "has some small wounds and bruises", "is showing a few battle scars", "has quite a few wounds", "has some big nasty wounds and scratches", "has some very nasty wounds", "needs a hospital", "is gravely injured", "is at death's door" }
default_color = "lightgray" default_range = "????"
function start_study(name, line, args) Send("study " .. args[1]) SendNoEcho("echo stop_study") EnableTrigger("study_health_trigger", true) end
function stop_study() EnableTrigger("study_health_trigger", false) end
function print_one_study_line(name, line, args) health_string = args.damage_desc color = damage_table[args.damage_desc]["color"] range = damage_table[args.damage_desc]["range"]
ColourNote(default_color, "", "[", color, "", range, default_color, "", "] ", default_color, "", line) end
function test_colors () for _, damage in ipairs(damage_order) do color = damage_table[damage]["color"] range = damage_table[damage]["range"] ColourNote(default_color, "", "[", color, "", range, default_color, "", "] " .. damage) end end
